document_data.name: The Temple Bell
document_data.mainbody: '''The Temple Bell''' was a shop in [[Athkatla]]'s rich [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Temple Bell stood on [[Aundle's Walk]] in the Temple District, three buildings east of the busy [[Harfin Draether]] tavern.
document_data.Services: The shop did business selling goods of religious nature. It offered accessories, ''[[holy symbol]]s'', vestments, and religious texts, all dedicated to various churches and deities of the Realms.
document_data.History: Before the Temple Bell took ownership of the building, it was the mansion of the [[Flamaerdown]] family of Athkatla. By the late 14{{th}} century DR, Flamaerdowns were presumed to have gone extinct and the Temple Bell shop occupied the estate.
